Metaphor:CANCER IS PHYSICAL COMBAT

From EN MetaNet Wiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Name Gloss CANCER IS PHYSICAL COMBAT
Name Transcription
Aliases
Description
Comments Both the cancer patient and the cancer can be metaphorically conceptualized as physical combatants, though linguistic expressions of this metaphor most frequently take the patient's perspective in this combat, with the patient is the primary aggressor (e.g. 'She fought cancer'.)
Tags
Family Cancer metaphors
Metaphor Level Specific
Metaphor Type Composed/complex
Experiential Basis
Cultural Scope
Source Frame Physical combat
Roles:fighter1, fighter2, physical interaction x-schema, outcome
Target Frame Cancer
Roles:cancer, cancer_patient, cancerous_body_part


Mappings:

cancer_patient <= fighter1
cancer <= fighter2

Related Metaphors:

Current Metaphor CANCER IS PHYSICAL COMBAT
Relation Type is related to
Related Metaphor CANCER PATIENT IS PHYSICAL COMBATANT
Description
